name: CalAtlantic Group Inc

content: Oct 30 The following bids  mergers  acquisitions and disposals were reported by 2000 GMT on Monday:
name: CalAtlantic Group Inc
title: Deals of the day-Mergers and acquisitions

content: Lennar Corp  will buy smaller rival CalAtlantic Group Inc  for $5.7 billion  creating the largest homebuilder in the United States as it strives to deal with higher land acquisition costs and a tighter labor market.
name: CalAtlantic Group Inc
title: Lennar buys CalAtlantic to become largest U.S. homebuilder

content: * Offer represents a 27 pct premium to CalAtlantic's Friday close
name: CalAtlantic Group Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Lennar buys CalAtlantic to become largest U.S. homebuilder

content: * Lennar - ‍if deal terminated under certain conditions  co to pay CalAtlantic $178.7 million fee or CalAtlantic may be required to pay co $178.7 million fee Source text for Eikon: (http://bit.ly/2A0pyo0) Further company coverage:
name: CalAtlantic Group Inc
title: BRIEF-Lennar to pay CalAtlantic $178.7 mln  ‍if deal terminated

content: * ‍Lennar and CalAtlantic announce business combination creating nation's leading homebuilder​
name: CalAtlantic Group Inc
title: BRIEF-Lennar to buy CalAtlantic Group in about $9.3 bln deal

content: Oct 30 Lennar Corp said it would buy smaller rival CalAtlantic Group Inc in a deal valued at about $9.3 billion  including debt  creating the nation's largest homebuilder.
name: CalAtlantic Group Inc
title: Lennar to buy CalAtlantic Group in about $9.3 bln deal
